review: I love the fire stick but it was a pain to hook up. I ended up asking the young man next door to help me. He got it hooked up but it was in German and he had a difficult time switching it to English. I'm enjoying it now though.

review: This Fire TV Stick, works good with Netflix and does not need to be attached to Amazon Prime.  It is easy to install, and it takes less then 10 minutes.  D. Sterling
